div.p: We have a rich school history in Oak Ridge since 1874.
Our Children, Our Future... Expanding for Excellence
Small classroom sizes allow us to give individualized attention.

p.span:
We're Proud
of Who We Are

span.p: We're a rural school in southeast Missouri with a rich history in the Oak Ridge community and progressive ideas in the classroom. We care deeply about each and every student that enters our doors and are dedicated to ensuring their bright futures. Because we are smaller in size, we're able to devote more attention to each student which helps them succeed academically and beyond.

div.div: Our Teachers are Experienced and Our Students Achieve

div.p:
Support Oak Ridge Schools with a
purchase from our School Store.
Click on any photo below to see why!

img.p: I love Oak Ridge because its a very small community and everybody here is nice. The teachers are very helpful!

img.h3: Bridget Watson | Gifted, Speech, After School Care
img.p: I love Oak Ridge because it is a K-12 school. I like to see the students as they begin their journey exploring learning, and when they transition into young professionals in their educational careers.

I have been in education now for 18 years. Oak Ridge is an awesome school! It has a community spirit that I have not found in the other schools that I have been a part. The students, staff, parents and community at large have a vested interest in seeing all parts of the school succeed. I'm glad that I get to be part of the long history of excellence that is the Oak Ridge R-VI school system.

img.h3: Kim Scheffer | Elementary Admin Asst, Alumni, Parent
img.p: I am a generational family member who attended all 12 years here. What I liked most was knowing everyone I went to school with, most were and still are like extended family. We always come together in times of need. My family chose to stay in the community so we could have the same opportunities. Now, I get to see my children and other children learn from very dedicated teachers who work with each student's unique characteristics to help them learn to the best of their ability.
I like how small it is because I know everybody.
I love Oak Ridge because of the students, staff, and activities.
I love Oak Ridge because its a small school and I love how nice all the teachers are!
I love Oak Ridge because of the small class sizes, and the personal learning experience.
I love Oak Ridge because its a very small community and everybody here is nice. The teachers are very helpful!
